53#include "libfdt_env.h"
54
55#include <fdt.h>
56#include <libfdt.h>
57
58#include "libfdt_internal.h"
59
60struct fdt_errtabent {
61 const char *str;
62};
63
64#define FDT_ERRTABENT(val) \
65 [(val)] = { .str = #val, }
66
67static struct fdt_errtabent fdt_errtable[] = {
68 FDT_ERRTABENT(FDT_ERR_NOTFOUND),
69 FDT_ERRTABENT(FDT_ERR_EXISTS),
70 FDT_ERRTABENT(FDT_ERR_NOSPACE),
71
72 FDT_ERRTABENT(FDT_ERR_BADOFFSET),
73 FDT_ERRTABENT(FDT_ERR_BADPATH),
74 FDT_ERRTABENT(FDT_ERR_BADPHANDLE),
75 FDT_ERRTABENT(FDT_ERR_BADSTATE),
76
77 FDT_ERRTABENT(FDT_ERR_TRUNCATED),
78 FDT_ERRTABENT(FDT_ERR_BADMAGIC),
79 FDT_ERRTABENT(FDT_ERR_BADVERSION),
80 FDT_ERRTABENT(FDT_ERR_BADSTRUCTURE),
81 FDT_ERRTABENT(FDT_ERR_BADLAYOUT),
82 FDT_ERRTABENT(FDT_ERR_INTERNAL),
83 FDT_ERRTABENT(FDT_ERR_BADNCELLS),
84 FDT_ERRTABENT(FDT_ERR_BADVALUE),
85 FDT_ERRTABENT(FDT_ERR_BADOVERLAY),
86 FDT_ERRTABENT(FDT_ERR_NOPHANDLES),
87};
88#define FDT_ERRTABSIZE (sizeof(fdt_errtable) / sizeof(fdt_errtable[0]))
89
90const char *fdt_strerror(int errval)
91{
92 if (errval > 0)
93 return "<valid offset/length>";
94 else if (errval == 0)
95 return "<no error>";
96 else if (errval > -FDT_ERRTABSIZE) {
97 const char *s = fdt_errtable[-errval].str;
98
99 if (s)
100 return s;
101 }
102
103 return "<unknown error>";
104}
105
